timeline.bodyText: values() always iterates the enum in declared order and it's a sequential stream so findAny would always find the first of them.  So unless I'm missing something I think we're just doing extra work here (always iterating every value instead of short circuiting) for no benefit.
timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText:
Yeah - when testing, it seemed to be deterministic either way.  But I wasn't sure if the behavior was guaranteed or not.
According to this article they are deterministically ordered.  So, I can just revert this.
